Reviews.Title: Excellent Bundle Excellent Price Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Canon EOS 60D DSLR Camera Kit with Ultimate Pro Package last week. I am a huge Canon camera fan and this is my first DSLR. It is so easy to use and does not feel cheap like some other cameras do. Its just the right weight....not too heavy but not too light. The bundle contains alot of useful items. The extra battery and charger with the adapter to charge in the car will come in handy on trips. The extra lenses and filters are a plus too. Everything that is listed in the description is in the box. I have been taking pictures non stop. I love it!! This is definetly worth the money!I added a couple of pictures to the item description.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Item
Reviews.Author: Bipin Krishna
Reviews.Content: Hi,I purchased this item a few weeks back. They have provided all the item promised in the package.The tripod is not of the best quality, but it is still aluminum and they are manageable.Overall I love the product.

Reviews.Title: 60D more than I expected!
Reviews.Author: Unlisted Productions
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this. All the accessories really make the product greater than expected. There are some really useful things that I didn't know I would want.

Reviews.Title: The best I've ever had
Reviews.Author: StephanieJ
Reviews.Content: It is fantastic. Everything is beautiful and a dream come true. No lie, or joke, everything is real and perfect quality. I love this camera, it's amazing.
